Security Policy
===============

Supported Versions
------------------

+---------+---------------------+
| Version | Status              |
+=========+=====================+
| 3.1.x   | Stable version      |
+---------+---------------------+
| 3.0.x   | Security fix only   |
+---------+---------------------+
| 2.2.x   | Security fix only   |
+---------+---------------------+
| < 2.2   | not supported       |
+---------+---------------------+

Reporting a Vulnerability
-------------------------

Please disclose security vulnerabilities privately at miurahr@linux.com
